package.name: Statgrab
package.description:
libstatgrab is a library that provides a common interface for retrieving a variety of system statistics on a number of *NIX like systems.
This extension allows you to call the functions made available by libstatgrab library.

release.notes: 1) Allow compilation against libstatgrab 0.12 2) Fixed compilation on FreeBSD systems 3) Unflip network stats and incremental network stats 4) Fixed a few spelling mistakes
